name: AMBULATORY SURGERY CENTER ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Support for S. 1001 / H.R. 1838 - Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2017.

Support for S. 1001 / H.R. 1838 - Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2017. Support for H.R. 6138 - ASC Payment Transparency Act of 2018. Support for Sec. 2004 of H.R. 6 - SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act. Sec. XII of CY 2019 OPPS/ ASC Proposed Payment Rule, 83 Fed. Reg. 37046.

Support for S. 1001 / H.R. 1838 - Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2017. Support for H.R. 6138 - ASC Payment Transparency Act of 2018. Sec. XII of CY 2019 OPPS/ ASC Proposed Payment Rule, 83 Fed. Reg. 37046.
Support legislation to tie ambulatory surgery center payment updates to the hospital market basket.
Support legislation to tie ambulatory surgery center payment updates to the hospital market basket. H.R. 3429, the HEARTS and Rural Relief Act of 2019. Increase patient access to procedures in ASCs.

Support for H.R.4350, The Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2019 and legislation to tie ambulatory surgery center payment updates to the hospital market basket. H.R. 3429, the HEARTS and Rural Relief Act of 2019. Increase patient access to procedures in ASCs.

Support for H.R.4350/S. 3085, The Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2019, and legislation to tie ambulatory surgery center payment updates to the hospital market basket. H.R. 3429, the HEARTS and Rural Relief Act of 2019. Increase patient access to procedures in ASCs. Discontinuance of ASC relative weight scalar. Extension of Medicare out-of-pocket cap.

Support for H.R.4350/S. 3085, The Ambulatory Surgical Center Quality and Access Act of 2019, and legislation to tie ambulatory surgery center payment updates to the hospital market basket. H.R. 3429, the HEARTS and Rural Relief Act of 2019. Increase patient access to procedures in ASCs. Discontinuance of ASC relative weight scalar. Extension of Medicare out-of-pocket cap in HOPD to ASC setting. Extension of Medicare sequester delay in division N sec. 102 of H.R. 133 - Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021 and H.R. 8840 - Medicare Sequester COVID Moratorium Act.

Increased patient access and reimbursement to procedures in ambulatory surgical centers. 

Introduction to MedPAC Commissioner nominee.
